Package net.royalur.model.dice

Class Dice<R extends Roll>

java.lang.Object
net.royalur.model.dice.Dice<R>
Type Parameters:
R - The type of rolls generated by this dice.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Named<Name>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryDice
public abstract class Dice<R extends Roll> extends Object implements Named<Name>
A generator of dice rolls.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Dice(Name name, RandomGenerator random)
    Instantiates this dice with random as the source of randomness to generate dice rolls.

  • Constructor Details

    • Dice

      public Dice(@Nonnull Name name, @Nonnull RandomGenerator random)
      Instantiates this dice with random as the source of randomness to generate dice rolls.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of this dice.
      random - The source of randomness used to generate dice rolls.

  • Method Details

    • hasState

      public boolean hasState()
      Returns whether this dice holds any state that affects its dice rolls. If this is overriden, then copyFrom(Dice) should also be overriden.
      Returns:
      Whether this dice holds any state that affects its dice rolls.

    • copyFrom

      public void copyFrom(@Nonnull Dice<R> other)
      Copies the state of other into this dice. If the dice does not have state, this is a no-op. The state copied does _not_ include the seeding of the random number generator. If this is overriden, then hasState() should also be overriden.
      Parameters:
      other - The dice to copy the state from.

    • getName

      @Nonnull public Name getName()
      Description copied from interface: Named
      Get the name of this.
      Specified by:
      getName in interface Named<R extends Roll>
      Returns:
      The name of this.

    • getRandom

      @Nonnull public RandomGenerator getRandom()
      Gets the source of randomness that is used to generate dice rolls.
      Returns:
      The source of randomness that is used to generate dice rolls.

    • getMaxRollValue

      public abstract int getMaxRollValue()
      Gets the maximum value that could be rolled by this dice.
      Returns:
      The maximum value that this dice could possibly roll.

    • getRollProbabilities

      public abstract float[] getRollProbabilities()
      Gets the probability of rolling each value of the dice, where the index into the returned array represents the value of the roll.
      Returns:
      The probability of rolling each value of the dice.

    • rollValue

      public abstract int rollValue()
      Generates a random roll using this dice, and returns just the value. If this dice has state, this should call recordRoll(int).
      Returns:
      A random roll of this dice, and returns just the value.

    • recordRoll

      public void recordRoll(int value)
      Updates the state of this dice after having rolled value.
      Parameters:
      value - The value that was rolled using this dice.

    • generateRoll

      @Nonnull public abstract R generateRoll(int value)
      Generates a roll with value value using this dice.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of the dice to be rolled.
      Returns:
      A roll with value value of this dice.

    • roll

      @Nonnull public R roll()
      Generates a random roll using this dice.
      Returns:
      A random roll of this dice.
